about.missionContent1: Our mission is to support local Bitcoin communities through open-source education and networking. In order to do it, we collect, organize, and create the necessary resources (courses, books, posters, flyers, videos) for the Bitcoin industry to advance.
about.missionContent2: We centralize knowledge to better distribute it through a simple, multilingual GitHub repository and an E-learning platform. We assist local Bitcoin hubs in their development with the right tools for their talents to grow.
about.commitmentContent:
Our commitments towards the bitcoin community are the following: 
 • Remain open-source 
 • Provide high-quality educational content 
 • Translate our contents in as many languages as possible 
 • Support Bitcoin builders in their entrepreneurship journey
about.coreTeamContent: PlanB Network is a collective of hundreds of contributors, teachers, community leaders, designers, developers, and organizers. Many thanks to the numerous people who have made PlanB a reality and continue to do so each day. (Wall of contributors coming soon)
about.corporateContent: PlanB Network is the joint project of three entities focused on Bitcoin development. In an effort to make the Bitcoin education layers scale, they decided to collaborate to form PlanB Network. Since then,  many other entities have decided to contribute and join forces to help us bring Bitcoin education to the world. For this reason, a huge thank-you is due to them.
about.storyContent: PlanB network is an initiative that supports Bitcoin education worldwide. It's the crossover of various passionate Bitcoin companies focused on education, open-source software, peer-to-peer networks, and the sense of community. Together, they've decided to build the PlanB network and offer the Bitcoin ecosystem the right tools to grow. Our 2023 release presentation is available here.
about.description: Plan B Network helps communities worldwide to get organized in order to provide better education. The platform develops the  necessary tools towards that goal, through the online academy, the tutorials portal, the Bitcoin educational toolkit and the resource portal.
about.subtitle: Want to orange pill the world? Join the Plan ₿ Network.
about.title: About the Plan B Network
about.manifesto:
We believe in the decentralized future that Bitcoin offers.

Our mission is to introduce Bitcoin to a billion people within a decade, and our tools are education and information.

We support local communities of Bitcoiners by providing open-source educational content and offering a network of Bitcoin mentors.

Our philosophy is inspired by the cypherpunk manifesto. Just as they championed privacy, we champion education. In fact, we believe that knowledge is the foundation of freedom and change.

We are Bitcoin-only.

We advocate for the individual responsibility and the independence offered by owning your own keys.

We urge verification, not blind trust.

We believe that by fixing the money, we can fix the world.

We are decentralized and open-source, avoiding any single point of failure.

We encourage the free dissemination of our content.

We aspire to a world that operates from the bottom up, where the individual is at the center.

We simplify, we educate, we share.

Join us in our mission to orange-pill the world!

bet.pageDescription: Mass adoption is not easy. To move closer and more rapidly towards  that goal, we’ve developed an extendible database of educational content. exam.availableDashboard: It will be available in your dashboard in about 10 hours.
exam.certificateGeneration: Your certificate is being generated and
exam.congratulations: Congratulations, you’ve reached the end of this course!
exam.dontWorry: Don't worry about mistakes; this test helps reinforce your learning. If you don't pass, you can retake it after 24 hours.
exam.examDetails: The exam has 40 multiple-choice questions, each with one correct answer. You can change your answers anytime before submitting, as long as the timer is running.
exam.findInformationChapter: Find more information in this chapter :
exam.futureProof: Future-Proof: Your degree is permanently protected and always valid.
exam.globallyRecognized: Globally Recognized: Blockchain-backed credentials are trusted worldwide.
exam.instantVerification: Instant Verification: Employers can easily verify your degree’s authenticity and issue date.
exam.oopsFailed: Oops, it seems that you <0>failed</0> the final exam.
exam.planBTimeStamp: At Plan ₿ Network, we secure your degree using time-stamping technology backed by blockchain.
exam.quitWithoutSubmitting: Oups, it seems that you left the page without submitting your answers. This cancels the test.
exam.retakeInstructions: You have 20 minutes to answer 40 questions, each with only one correct answer. You can navigate between questions and submit your answers at the end.
exam.sameRules: You are about to retake the final exam. The rules remain the same.
exam.sureSubmit: Are you sure to submit your exam ?
exam.tamperProof: Tamper-Proof: Blockchain ensures no one can alter or fake your credential.
exam.testKnowledge: Now that you’ve completed this course, let’s test your knowledge.
exam.timeStampHowDescription: When your degree is issued, a unique digital 'fingerprint' is created and stored on the blockchain. This makes the record permanent and tamper-proof. Any attempt to alter your degree will break the link, revealing the change.
exam.timerStart: Once you click Start, a 20-minute timer will begin.
exam.verifyDisplayName: Before starting, please verify your display name below, as it will be used to generate your diploma.
exam.whyTimeStamp:
Time-Stamping Your Degree:
Why It Matters
exam.wishTryAgain: If you wish to try again, the exam will be available in 24 hours.

explorer.buildPath: Build your own path down the rabbit hole
explorer.findCourses: Find the perfect course for your needs thanks to the course selector
explorer.footerTitle: Our professors are here for you!
explorer.footerp1: At the Sovereign University, our professors have complete autonomy over their content and the tools they want you to explore, as long as they follow the code of ethics. They are passionate bitcoiners from various backgrounds.
explorer.footerp2: If you want to improve a course or propose your own, you can easily do so via the GitHub repository. Instead, to support a professor, you have several options: you can provide course feedback, tip the professor directly, or become a university member to help sustain the platform.
explorer.journey: Bitcoin is a journey, not a destination
explorer.pageDescription: The Plan ₿ Academy is dedicated to simplify Bitcoin education worldwide. Curated by experts from various fields, our academy provides a comprehensive range of courses designed to clarify every aspect of Bitcoin. From beginner to expert, whether at your own pace or followed weekly by a professor, we hope the academy can help you comprehend better the vast subject that is Bitcoin. A large part of our courses are entirely free so that anyone, anywhere, can have access to education.
explorer.pageSubtitle: Mass adoption through centralized open-source education
explorer.s2p1: If you've started exploring the Bitcoin rabbit hole, you must know that it's an endless journey with many paths. Here at the university, we understand this and have design our educational content to be non-linear, autonomous and as extensive as it can be.
explorer.s2p2: You will be able to pick your own path and go along it, gaining skills and knowledge as far as your motivation goes.
explorer.s2p3: All our courses are 100% free so nothing can stop you!
explorer.s2t1: Bitcoin education is a journey, not a destination.
explorer.s3t1: Build your own path down the rabbit hole

header.content: The Plan ₿ network platform aims to provide the best tools and educational content worldwide, empowering people to regain their sovereignty. From individuals to communities, we are here to help you along your Bitcoin journey.

sectionEducation.title: From beginner to advanced
sectionEducation.subtitle: Learn Bitcoin at the academy
sectionEducation.content1: Bitcoin is not only a technology and a form of money, but also a revolutionary way to approach life. In line with this awareness, our courses cover a wide range of fields, empowering individuals to excel in their areas of interest and further their understanding. From your first Bitcoin lesson to a deep dive into the protocol's specifics, we will help you navigate the rabbit hole safely. There's no reason to hesitate. Knowledge awaits you.

sectionNetwork.title: Access a network of
sectionNetwork.subtitle: Worldwide Bitcoin Campuses
sectionNetwork.content1: Connect with worldwide Bitcoin enthusiasts who share a common passion. From small communities meeting regularly, to BTC educational centers, our network map will help you find the inspiration to learn and build. You will discover a wide range of services, such as an incubation center, physical workshops, seminars, BTC retreats, and more. The network is open to everyone, so come and say hi to your local BTC community!

tutorialSection.title: Bitcoin education made simple.
tutorialSection.subtitle1: We help you master the technology with numerous in-depth tutorials!
tutorialSection.content1: Bitcoin is constantly evolving, with the emergence of new actors, solutions, protocols, and technological breakthroughs. Thus, it can be challenging to maintain an accurate and up-to-date database of quality tutorials. Here at Plan ₿, we have achieved just that. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced user, you can navigate hundreds of tutorials to explore our industry according to your needs.

aboutUsSection.title: Who are we?
aboutUsSection.subtitle: A little bit about us
aboutUsSection.content: Plan ₿ Network supports Bitcoin education worldwide. It represents a collaboration of passionate Bitcoin companies focused on education, open-source software, peer-to-peer networks, and community building. Together, they have launched this initiative to provide the Bitcoin ecosystem with the essential tools for growth.
aboutUsSection.bitcoinFocusContent: We explore the Bitcoin revolution from the base layer to the surrounding peer-to-peer communications.
aboutUsSection.openSourceContent: We promote the free flow of knowledge and support open-source solutions
aboutUsSection.communityContent: We are first and foremost a community of enthusiasts helping each other on the Bitcoin journey
aboutUsSection.privacyContent: We believe privacy is one of the most fundamental human rights that is essential for progress

languageSection.title: No language barrier here.
languageSection.subtitle: Everything is translated into local languages!
languageSection.content1: At Plan ₿, we believe Bitcoin is an international revolution that concerns everyone. To empower billions of people, we are designing this platform to be multilingual and accessible to all. The platform currently supports 7 languages, and more are being added every month. To achieve this, we use a mix of AI and the passion of Bitcoiners around the world.
languageSection.content2: You too can start bootstrapping your own local network in your country!

patreonSection.title: Together let's make Bitcoin education better !
patreonSection.subtitle: The Plan ₿ Network is 100% open-source thanks to our generous patrons
patreonSection.content: The Plan ₿ Network is proud to team up with many bitcoin companies around the world in order to provide the best educational resources possible !

nodeNetwork.answer1: A node is an educational initiative connected to a community somewhere in the world. It can take the form of a building where Bitcoin education takes place, but it can include so much more. Although Plan ₿ Network operates hubs, establishing them in every city worldwide is unrealistic. That’s why we rely on communities of bitcoiners to help us turn this global network into a reality.
nodeNetwork.answer2: By joining our network, you gain access to exclusive content that Plan ₿ distributes through its platform, which you can share with the residents of your node. The most important benefit is the opportunity to open channels of discussion for future projects and connect with other communities worldwide to share each other's experiences.
nodeNetwork.answer3: Plan ₿ Network initially focuses on nodes that operate from a physical space. In the future, we plan to integrate more initiatives that could benefit from the network’s support for growth.
nodeNetwork.answer4: A Bitcoin node can vary in size, and different grades will be assigned based on specific requirements. For instance, a node that includes a hackerspace, a gym, and office space will be regarded as more citadel-like.
nodeNetwork.answer5: We wish to offer a safe haven for bitcoiners around the world. We believe that by helping local hubs grow, we will be able to create a network of citadels where they will be welcome to work, create, share, and discuss safely.
nodeNetwork.description1: We believe that education should not only take place online but also in physical spaces. To achieve this, Plan B Network manages a network of hubs around the world to welcome thinkers, builders and educators fostering the advancement of Bitcoin and freedom technologies.
nodeNetwork.descriptionextend: Our first step is to invite communities with physical spaces, which we refer to as the “full nodes” of our network, to join us. In the future, as our network strengthens, we will extend this invitation to more initiatives worldwide. If you share our values, please reach out to our representatives to join our network and help build the best Bitcoin education possible.
nodeNetwork.mobiledescription: We believe that education should not only take place online but also in physical spaces. To achieve this, Plan B Network manages a network of hubs around the world to welcome thinkers, builders and educators fostering the advancement of Bitcoin and freedom technologies.Our first step is to invite communities with physical spaces, which we refer to as the “full nodes” of our network, to join us. In the future, as our network strengthens, we will extend this invitation to more initiatives worldwide. If you share our values, please reach out to our representatives to join our network and help build the best Bitcoin education possible.
nodeNetwork.pageSubtitle: Want to orange pill the world ? Join the Plan ₿ Network.

resources.filterBarLabel: Find the perfect resources for your needs:
resources.github: All this data is managed via one open-source <0>Github</0> repository. Feel free to contribute and add any missing content.
resources.headerText: Welcome into the infinite rabbit hole of Bitcoin ! In this section we will offer you in depth tutorial on most bitcoin project out there. This pages in maintain by benevolel and passionate bitcoin who support this open source project. If you fee we made a mistake please reach out. To see our financial attachment ot the project mention refer to our transparency report. Thanks for your trust in this university and enjoy the ride.
resources.pageDescription: Trying to understand Bitcoin is like exploring a maze that keeps growing. To help you in your journey, we've compiled a vast array of resources including books, podcasts, videos and conferences replays. This portal gathers all the information in one Github repository to help you grasp a better understanding of the Bitcoin ecosystem.
resources.pageSubtitle: Centralize knowledge to better distribute it

details.author: Author :
details.checkAuthor: Check out the author's other contributions and support his work.
details.madeBy: This tutorial has been made by

centralized.description: Centralized exchanges are usually regulated entities that act as intermediaries between the banking system and the bitcoin ecosystem. They allow you to buy and sell large amounts of bitcoin and withdraw it to your wallet or bank account. They usually require KYC, and therefore monitor your activity, reporting it to financial surveillance institutions to respect local laws.

exchange.description: Exchanges are one of the entry and exit doors between your traditional currency (euro, dollars) and the bitcoin world. Exchanges can be regulated and KYC (Know Your Customer) compliant, or peer-to-peer and anonymous. Each exchange will offer different features, fee structures, liquidity, and customer support. Each bitcoiner will use a different one based on their needs and convictions.

peer-to-peer.description: Peer-to-peer exchanges are marketplaces where individuals exchange bitcoin for other currencies between themselves. These exchanges could be regulated or not and usually don't ask for much information (if any) about you. They simply facilitate the relationship between users. Their fees could be higher than traditional exchanges and their liquidity a bit lower. It is the preferred option for bitcoiners trying to avoid KYC.

exchange.shortDescription: Bitcoin buying-selling solutions, KYC and non-KYC
exchange.title: Exchange

explorer.description: All these tutorials have been written by passionate and dedicated bitcoiners, who wish to spread bitcoin education throughout the world. Don't forget to like, review, and tip them sats!

tutorials.headerText: Welcome into the infinite rabbit hole of Bitcoin ! In this section we will offer you in depth tutorial on most bitcoin project out there. This pages in maintain by benevolel and passionate bitcoin who support this open source project. If you fee we made a mistake please reach out. To see our financial attachment ot the project mention refer to our transparency report. Thanks for your trust in this university and enjoy the ride.

merchant.description: Ever wonder how to easily accept bitcoin for a business? Explore our various solutions to become an expert and easily set up a merchant solution for the shops around you. The Point of Sale solution varies based on the merchant's needs (physical or online), their volume, and the complexity of their operations. A generally good proxy is to simply start with a basic LN wallet, move to an easy, efficient solution (such as mobile PoS), and finally explore BTC Pay Server for advanced, complex, professional solutions.
merchant.shortDescription: Solutions for businesses to accept Bitcoin
merchant.title: Merchant

mining.description: The mining industry is a complex topic full of rabbit holes within. Here, we will try to accompany you on your journey by using hardware and software. From modifying an S9 into a home heater to trying to win the lottery with a nerd miner.
mining.title: Mining

bitcoin.description: A Bitcoin Core node is the ground zero of your Bitcoin sovereignty stack. It allows you to run the Bitcoin software and be part of the network. You will validate blocks and transactions, decide which rules you want to apply within the network, and stop using intermediaries to propagate your transactions. There are many ways to run a Bitcoin node, some more user-friendly than others.

node.description: Nodes are like your personal servers. In Bitcoin, it's the software that allows you to run the network, collect transactions, verify the rules, and be truly sovereign. Within our ecosystem, there exist various nodes, from Bitcoin Core, to Lightning implementations, RGB, or other more advanced privacy solutions.

lightning-network.description: A Lightning node allows you to take part in the Bitcoin layer 2 protocol called Lightning. You will be able to open channels, manage their liquidity, participate in the graph, and become non-custodial regarding your Lightning wallet.
lightning-network.name: Lightning Network

rgb.description: RGB is a scalable & confidential smart contracts system for Bitcoin & lightning network. It is a programmability layer for Bitcoin, with concepts of private & mutual ownership, abstraction and separation of concerns and represent "post-blockchain".

node.shortDescription: Solutions to operate a bitcoin node and join the network
node.title: Node

others.title: Others
others.shortDescription: Explore diverse tutorials on closely related topics of bitcoin
others.description: Dive into a large collection of tutorials that are closely related to Bitcoin ethos. From DIY to open-source tutorial, discover new areas of knowledge to become even more sovereign.

DIY.description: Discover our DIY tutorials to learn how to create things related to Bitcoin, computing, and individual sovereignty by yourself!

OpenSource.description: Explore our tutorials dedicated to the use of open-source tools!

contribution.description: Learn how to contribute to PlanB Network and master the open-source tools we use internally through our detailed tutorials!

general.description: Browse our general tutorials to enrich your knowledge in computing and other subjects related to individual sovereignty!

tutorials.pageDescription: Bitcoin is a wide industry, that becomes wider and wider everyday. To help you explore it, we’ve gathered and curated a large number of tutorials that describe various solutions in all domains related to Bitcoin.
tutorials.pageSubtitle: Unlock the mysteries of Bitcoin by exploring its vast ecosystem

bitcoin.description: Bitcoin is not private by default, it is intentionally designed to be pseudonymous, and every transaction is public and stored forever. In order to regain some confidentiality, we must use best user practices and specific tools integrated into our software. From avoiding address reuse to CoinJoin, through mixing your coins and connecting to your own node, we will help you on your journey towards privacy.

privacy.description: Privacy is a fundamental right. While we aspire to a world where privacy is the default, it is not the reality we live in. We will try to explain to you the best practices, assist you with tutorials, and set you on a more sovereign path regarding your data.

general.description: In the era of mass surveillance, regaining a certain level of privacy in your everyday life is essential. Given that each user will have a certain degree of paranoia and technological knowledge, it is perfectly normal to use certain tools and adapt them to your needs. Here, we will explore different protection solutions such as VPNs, Tor, Tails OS, PGP, encrypted messages, and much more.

privacy.shortDescription: Tools for backup and maintaining privacy
privacy.title: Privacy

wallet.description: A Bitcoin wallet is like your keychain. It allows you to spend and receive bitcoin. There are a lot of different types of wallets, all with different use cases, functions, costs, and user experiences. Each bitcoiner will use a different device based on their needs, level of exigence, and experience.

desktop.description: Desktop wallets are usually for more advanced users as they combine the use of hardware devices and the desktop wallet software. It's like having a new, more custom, and functionality-intensive interface for your hardware device to use. Such wallets offer multi-signature options, privacy features, inheritance integration mechanisms, and more.

hardware.description: Hardware wallets are usually used to store your long-term bitcoin savings. They are physical devices that aren't connected to the internet (often called "cold wallets") and are usually highly secure. Even though these devices are often open-source regarding their software, the hardware costs around 50 to 300 euros. Consider these devices like a bank account for larger amounts of savings that you would use once in a while.

mobile.description: Mobile wallets are usually used for daily spending. They integrate the Lightning Network for low-fee, instant transactions. They are usually connected to the internet (often called "hot wallets") and are therefore less secure than hardware wallets. They should be used only to store small amounts of bitcoin, consider them as your everyday wallet in your pocket.

wallet.shortDescription: Security solutions and usage of your bitcoins
wallet.title: Wallet

underConstruction.itemNotFoundOrTranslated: {{item}} not found, or not translated in your language
underConstruction.p1: A rabbit has tumbled down a hole. Because of this unexpected adventure, this page is under a bit of construction at the moment. We apologize for any inconvenience.
